ddl:
CREATE TABLE `patents-public-data.patents.publications`
(
  publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Patent publication number (DOCDB compatible), eg: 'US-7650331-B1'"),
  application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Patent application number (DOCDB compatible), eg: 'US-87124404-A'. This may not always be set."),
  country_code STRING OPTIONS(description="Country code, eg: 'US', 'EP', etc"),
  kind_code STRING OPTIONS(description="Kind code, indicating application, grant, search report, correction, etc. These are different for each country."),
  application_kind STRING OPTIONS(description="High-level kind of the application: A=patent; U=utility; P=provision; W= PCT; F=design; T=translation."),
  application_number_formatted STRING OPTIONS(description="Application number, formatted to the patent office format where possible."),
  pct_number STRING OPTIONS(description="PCT number for this application if it was part of a PCT filing, eg: 'PCT/EP2008/062623'."),
  family_id STRING OPTIONS(description="Family ID (simple family). Grouping on family ID will return all publications associated with a simple patent family (all publications share the same priority claims)."),
  spif_publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="SPIF standard (spif.group) publication number, after 2000"),
  spif_application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="SPIF standard (spif.group) application number, after 2000"),
  title_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING OPTIONS(description="Localized text"), language STRING OPTIONS(description="Two-letter language code for this text"), truncated BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this text truncated?")>> OPTIONS(description="The publication titles in different languages"),
  abstract_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING OPTIONS(description="Localized text"), language STRING OPTIONS(description="Two-letter language code for this text"), truncated BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this text truncated?")>> OPTIONS(description="The publication abstracts in different languages"),
  claims_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING OPTIONS(description="Localized text"), language STRING OPTIONS(description="Two-letter language code for this text"), truncated BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this text truncated?")>> OPTIONS(description="For US publications only, the claims in plain text"),
  claims_localized_html ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING OPTIONS(description="Localized text"), language STRING OPTIONS(description="Two-letter language code for this text"), truncated BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this text truncated?")>> OPTIONS(description="For US publications only, the claims in HTML"),
  description_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING OPTIONS(description="Localized text"), language STRING OPTIONS(description="Two-letter language code for this text"), truncated BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this text truncated?")>> OPTIONS(description="For US publications only, the description in plain text, limited to the first 9 megabytes"),
  description_localized_html ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING OPTIONS(description="Localized text"), language STRING OPTIONS(description="Two-letter language code for this text"), truncated BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this text truncated?")>> OPTIONS(description="For US publications only, the description in HTML, limited to the first 9 megabytes"),
  publication_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The publication date."),
  filing_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The filing date."),
  grant_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The grant date, or 0 if not granted."),
  priority_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The earliest priority date from the priority claims, or the filing date."),
  priority_claim ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [publication_number]"), application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [application_number]"), npl_text STRING OPTIONS(description="Free-text citation (non-patent literature, etc)."), type STRING OPTIONS(description="The type of reference (see parent field for values)."), category STRING OPTIONS(description="The category of reference (see parent field for values)."), filing_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The filing date.")>> OPTIONS(description="The application numbers of the priority claims of this publication."),
  inventor ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The inventors."),
  inventor_harmonized ARRAY<STRUCT<name STRING OPTIONS(description="Name"), country_code STRING OPTIONS(description="The two-letter country code")>> OPTIONS(description="The harmonized inventors and their countries."),
  assignee ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The assignees/applicants."),
  assignee_harmonized ARRAY<STRUCT<name STRING OPTIONS(description="Name"), country_code STRING OPTIONS(description="The two-letter country code")>> OPTIONS(description="The harmonized assignees and their countries."),
  examiner ARRAY<STRUCT<name STRING OPTIONS(description="Name"), department STRING OPTIONS(description="The examiner's department"), level STRING OPTIONS(description="The examiner's level")>> OPTIONS(description="The examiner of this publication and their countries."),
  uspc ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING OPTIONS(description="Classification code"), inventive BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification inventive/main?"), first BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification the first/primary?"), tree ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The full classification tree from the root to this code")>> OPTIONS(description="The US Patent Classification (USPC) codes."),
  ipc ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING OPTIONS(description="Classification code"), inventive BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification inventive/main?"), first BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification the first/primary?"), tree ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The full classification tree from the root to this code")>> OPTIONS(description="The International Patent Classification (IPC) codes."),
  cpc ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING OPTIONS(description="Classification code"), inventive BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification inventive/main?"), first BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification the first/primary?"), tree ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The full classification tree from the root to this code")>> OPTIONS(description="The Cooperative Patent Classification (CPC) codes."),
  fi ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING OPTIONS(description="Classification code"), inventive BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification inventive/main?"), first BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification the first/primary?"), tree ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The full classification tree from the root to this code")>> OPTIONS(description="The FI classification codes."),
  fterm ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING OPTIONS(description="Classification code"), inventive BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification inventive/main?"), first BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification the first/primary?"), tree ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The full classification tree from the root to this code")>> OPTIONS(description="The F-term classification codes."),
  locarno ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING OPTIONS(description="Classification code"), inventive BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification inventive/main?"), first BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification the first/primary?"), tree ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The full classification tree from the root to this code")>> OPTIONS(description="The Locarno classification codes."),
  citation ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [publication_number]"), application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [application_number]"), npl_text STRING OPTIONS(description="Free-text citation (non-patent literature, etc)."), type STRING OPTIONS(description="The type of reference (see parent field for values)."), category STRING OPTIONS(description="The category of reference (see parent field for values)."), filing_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The filing date.")>> OPTIONS(description="The citations of this publication. Category is one of {CH2 = Chapter 2; SUP = Supplementary search report ; ISR = International search report ; SEA = Search report; APP = Applicant; EXA = Examiner; OPP = Opposition; 115 = article 115; PRS = Pre-grant pre-search; APL = Appealed; FOP = Filed opposition}, Type is one of {A = technological background; D = document cited in application; E = earlier patent document; 1 = document cited for other reasons; O = Non-written disclosure; P = Intermediate document; T = theory or principle; X = relevant if taken alone; Y = relevant if combined with other documents}"),
  parent ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [publication_number]"), application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [application_number]"), npl_text STRING OPTIONS(description="Free-text citation (non-patent literature, etc)."), type STRING OPTIONS(description="The type of reference (see parent field for values)."), category STRING OPTIONS(description="The category of reference (see parent field for values)."), filing_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The filing date.")>> OPTIONS(description="The parent applications (continuations, etc). Category is one of {continuation, continuation-in-part, divisional}."),
  child ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [publication_number]"), application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [application_number]"), npl_text STRING OPTIONS(description="Free-text citation (non-patent literature, etc)."), type STRING OPTIONS(description="The type of reference (see parent field for values)."), category STRING OPTIONS(description="The category of reference (see parent field for values)."), filing_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The filing date.")>> OPTIONS(description="The child applications (continuations, etc). Category is one of {continuation, continuation-in-part, divisional}."),
  entity_status STRING OPTIONS(description="The USPTO entity status (large, small)."),
  art_unit STRING OPTIONS(description="The USPTO art unit performing the examination (2159, etc).")
);
